question: Which of the following was the first Muslim ruler to annex Kangra?
explanation: Jahangir was the firstÂ  muslim ruler to have annexed Kangra in 1620 A.D. Whereas in 1622 A.D., Qandahara was occupied by Shah Abbas of Persia. Jahangir inflicted a crushing defeat on the combined forces of Ahmadnagar, Bijapur, and Golconda.
